arabic_text: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: (9) And upon Allāh[693] is the direction of the [right] way, and among them [i.e., the various paths] are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
footnotes: [693]- Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) has taken it upon Himself to guide man to the right path.  The meaning has also been interpreted as "To Allāh..."
